title: Money D greater than money S--effect on IR - bonds

content.prompt: Nominal interest rates and prices of previously issued bonds will be affected in which of the following ways when money demand exceeds money supply?

choices.label: Nominal interest rates will decrease, and bond prices will decrease.
Nominal interest rates will increase, and bond prices will decrease.
Nominal interest rates will decrease, and bond prices will increase.
Nominal interest rates will increase, and bond prices will increase.
Nominal interest rates will not change, and bond prices will not change.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
